Localization.Name: Locked-on Lentil Burrito
Localization.Description:
NDR: 49
Effects: Hypertrophic, Hyper-Metabolic

Torpedo Burrito crams a full payload of flavor into their hearty and healthy Locked-On Lentil burrito, featuring a blend of lentils and vegetables wrapped in their signature size-4 multi-grain tortilla.
